text1:
>It seems to have "chosen" me. 

>Is this thing alive?

>Like a servant choosing their master.

>To make it move, I just have to think about it moving.

>I don't know... I vaguely remember that mark...

>Fuck, it hurts just thinking about it.

>2 minutes is all I get before my sanity turns to dust. Literally.

- Captain's logs
You enter into a deep state of focus... Increases speed and swinging power of the sword.
